headline: LEYBOLD LOW PRESSURE SAFTEY SWITCH

specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model PS 113
Description Low Pressure Saftey Switch
Other Information Switching pressure: Approx. 5 mbar below atmospheric pressure
Switch back pressure: 3 mbar below atmospheric pressure
Switch accuracy: 1 mbar
Switching capacity: 220 VAC 5 Amp 1200 VA
Flange: KF 16
Exterior Dimensions
Width 2.000 in (5.1 cm)
Height 3.000 in (7.6 cm)
Weight 1 lb (0 kg)
